name: So Fierce and Strong Shirt
description:
So Fierce and Strong Shirt This is a front and back oversized print shirt. Currently only available in red. To view the entire shirt as worn by our drummer Andrew Poling click for front as well as back Designed by Rob Chipman (the bassist)
The words "The angels will dance among us, so fierce and strong" are lyrics from our albums title track "City of Light"

name: City of Light CD
description:
Kelly Tucker from Arcane Press and Promotions Gave us 4 out of 5 stars in the following review: This eagerly awaited full-length CD has been the talk of Cincinnati hardcore lovers since the news of its upcoming release. With the celebratory release show coming in less than a week, the anticipation for some is agonizing. Fans eagerly awaiting a sequel to So Came the Decimation however, should look elsewhere. In their new full-length album, The Beneath deliver epic technical songs with vocals reminiscent of 80’s metal, among a diverse mix of sounds carefully blended to perfection. Fans of Protest the Hero, All That Remains, and even Dragonforce will certainly appreciate the turn the band has taken. The 45-minute album kicks off beautifully with a slow acoustic fade-up, building to the inevitable explosion of brutal goodness that listeners have been craving. Tyler’s screams are simply the icing on the cake. On a cake that needs more icing, that is. Let’s just say more of the incredibly powerful vocals would not have done the album any harm. The band’s musical maturity and experience is revealed without doubt through their accomplishment of such diverse styles in one album. In one sitting, The Beneath takes the listener from slow acoustic guitar to technical metal riffs, from ambient metal to smooth piano to blasting drum beats. They also accomplish a major goal for every ideal album: a powerful, memorable introduction and conclusion. Die-hard fans and strangers to The Beneath alike will not be disappointed with this album. Note: Blake and I recommend watching Constantine (starring Keanu Reeves) while listening to this album for a truly epic experience.
Contains 7 songs for a total of 45 minutes of listening enjoyment.
